conversations.body_text: Hi karim hassaine,    We can only enter one address. Please provide a confirmed address.

The address is correct, but in the delivery comments, please write HORIZON MOTO


Le lun. 1 déc. 2025 à 10:30, service@simsonn.com
Hi karim hassaine,    Okay, thank you for the clarification. Please confirm:  Karim HASSANE  HORIZON MOTO  11 Rue d'Epluches  95310 Saint-Ouen-l'Aumône  France  +33 6 64 43 19 33

My first name is HassAIne

Thanks

Le mar. 2 déc. 2025 à 11:17, service@simsonn.com

LAST Name (sorry)

HassAIne

Le mar. 2 déc. 2025 à 11:17, service@simsonn.com
Hi karim hassaine,    That's right, I made a mistake when copying. Don't worry, your package has already been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047110522748

Hello,
I'm contacting you again because I received the pedals but not the
footrest base I purchased at the same time.
Could you tell me if it will arrive in a separate package?

Sincerely


Le mer. 3 déc. 2025 à 02:47, service@simsonn.com
